text: University of South Dakota is a public university in Vermillion, South Dakota. The university has about 10,515 students. It was founded in 1862. The current president of the university is Sheila Gestring. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Coyotes. They have 15 varsity teams, most of which compete in The Summit League. The football team plays in the Missouri Valley Football Conference. ==Other websites== *University of South Dakota's Official website *South Dakota Coyotes' Official athletics website Category:Colleges and universities in South Dakota South Dakota South Dakota Category:1862 establishments in Dakota Territory
title: University of South Dakota
